Here are a list of readings, please check [Canvas](https://courseworks.columbia.edu/welcome/) for the pdfs of weekly readings. Which Include:

* The System of Professions - Abott, Andrew.
* Crititcal Theory of Tecnologyn - Feenberg, Andrew.
* Rethinking Objectivity - Megill, Allan.
* Weapons of Math Descruction - O'Neill, Cathy.
* The Rise of Statistical Thinking - Porter, Thomas.
* Trust in Numbers - Porter, Thomas.
* Order without Design - Bertaud, Alain.
* Making Technology Masculine - Ruth Oldenziel
* Making Social Science Matter - Flyvbjerg, Bent.
